Front-end Developer Intern minsk / Full-time

Job opening

Are you our new Tallent?

This is an excellent opportunity for both front- and back-end developers to learn from and work with a great team of developers, creatives, designers, producers, and directors to create immersive interactive experiences at one of the fastest growing creative studios.

An awareness of Canvas drawing, animation libraries, SVG, WebGL, etc. would be an advantage. Most importantly, you should have refined aesthetics, a strong knowledge of emergent trends in the interactive space and you must be comfortable spending time polishing visual effects.

What you’ll do

  • Work as a full member of the technical team alongside our design, UX, and production departments in the creation of digital experiences for real clients.
  • Hone your critical thinking and creative problem solving abilities.
  • Learn how to contribute to larger scale builds as a member of 2-6 person development teams.
  • Become better acquainted with the fundamentals of the web — HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AMD, Node.js, MVC frameworks, design patterns, data driven applications and WebGL.
  • Gain an understanding of server architecture, dev ops, and API development.

APPLY FOR THIS POSITION

* required
